page.title: 20LLANWERN STEELWORKS, NEWPORT
page.content:
Llanwern Steelworks Owned by BSC has a work area of 3.5 by 1.25 miles. It has 3 blast furnaces, two with a working volume of 1487 cubic metres and one with a working volume of 2289 cubic metres. There are 6 basic oxygen converters. A universal slabbing mill rolls ingots of up to 30 tons to slabs 9m by 250mm. There are also flat strip mills, pickling lines, four stand mill,annealing furnaces, 2 temper mills, 2 cut up lines. There are also other cold mill facilities. The plant is powered by 5 boilers producing 589 tonnes of steam per hour.
There are 4500 people employed at Llanwern.
